title: The Greatest adventures of Popeye
brief_description: A compilation of three full length animated cartoons nominated for an Academy Award. These action filled cartoons see the famous spinach eater with Olive Oyl, Wimpy and Brutus and are entertaining for all the family. Following the exciting animations is a bonus sing-a-long complete with bouncing ball to the theme song “Popeye the Sailor Man”.
